resources.string: A believer is like a brick for another believer, the one supporting the other.
you have to attach picture of you with the people you have hosted
Set up a method of payment to facilitate support for you to help with hosting expenses

In this page posts are created when a user hosts people in his/her house
 
By providing the following data :- 
- Picture with the people they hosted : To encourage other users to help someone if they can 
- Bank account : To let other people help with hosting expediences or to support the hosted people

In this page the people who has extra space in their houses can create a post to host other people 

 By providing the following data :- 
- Location : To let the people need hosting know where are they before start communicating 
- Picture of the house or the room 
- Phone number : For communication 
- Number of rooms available 
- Number of people he/she can host 
- Description : To provide extra information or a message to the guests

In this page the people who need help can post to request supplies such as food clothes etc.. 

 By providing the following data :- 
- Location : To let the people wants to help know where they are 
- Picture explains the reason of the request : To encourage people to help 
- Phone number : For communication 
- Description : To provide information about what they need help with

In this page showing :- 

 
- profile image : You can select new one by pressing the image 
- name : the name you entered while creating the account 
- support post : it will appear only if you created a post and you can either complete or delete it 
- demand post : It will appear only if you created a post and you can delete it 
- log out

1- Every user can create only one post in each page 
2- If you want to edit a post you can create new one and it will replace the old one 
3- phone numbers and bank accounts are clickable
if you like the app you can help us with
